function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly contagious virus with rapid global spread","Impact":"Global health crisis, economic losses, overwhelming healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, widespread testing and contact tracing, development of effective treatment and vaccines","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, telemedicine, vaccine development tools","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers, at-risk populations","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of precise and timely diagnosis","Impact":"Delayed treatment, increased spread of the virus, overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Investment in rapid and accurate testing technologies, improvement of laboratory conditions, increase in healthcare resources","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, laboratory automation, telehealth services","People":"Healthcare workers, individuals seeking diagnosis, at-risk populations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, research institutions"},{"Description":"Absence of approved therapy for COVID-19","Impact":"Limited treatment options, increased severity of infections, higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Accelerated research and development of antiviral drugs, investment in alternative treatment methods, implementation of supportive care protocols","Technologies":"Drug discovery platforms, clinical trial management systems, remote patient monitoring","People":"Healthcare workers, individuals with COVID-19, at-risk populations","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
